  • 方法详细资料

    • isConfined

      public boolean isConfined()
      Method to check if the location is in the valid range
      返回:
      True if the location is in the valid range False otherwise

    • distanceTo

      public double distanceTo​(LongLat location)
      Method to calculate the distance to the input location
      参数:
      location - the location to be calculated
      返回:
      the distance between two location

    • closeTo

      public boolean closeTo​(LongLat location)
      Method to check if the distance of input location is within 0.00015 degree
      参数:
      location - the location to be checked
      返回:
      True if the distance between two location is within 0.00015 degree False otherwise

    • nextPosition

      public LongLat nextPosition​(int degree)
      Method to calculate the location after moving 0.00015 degree in the direction of the input degree
      参数:
      degree - the direction in degree of the next step
      返回:
      the location after moving

    • samePoint

      public boolean samePoint​(LongLat other)
      Method to check if the input location is exactly same with the current location
      参数:
      other - the location to be checked
      返回:
      true if the input location is exactly same with the current location, false otherwise
